channel.title: Neovim on Clover Notes

item.title: Neovim and Windows
item.description:
Journey To Neovim

We all know I’m going to mention The Myth, The Legend The Primeagen, his video came on my YouTube Feed and that was the start of all this.

Do not do what you love. Learn to love what you are doing.

Life doesn’t unfold the way you planned think it should.

The video that popped up in my feed was this. Watching this video and looking at Primeagen moving FAST it was like a magic to me.
